issue.description: Cd99 (GeneID:673094, NM_025584.2) has no representation in the reference assembly in Build 37.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.description: Possible missing sequence from AL627212.21 disrupts alignment of NM_026601.1 (Hyi, GeneID:68180)
issue.resolution_text: The reference sequence is correct and the missing exons from NM_026601.2 are strain variation. The unaligned exons of NM_026601.2 are derived from transcripts BC024619.1 and BC100401.1 both of these are derived from strain FBV/N. PCR performed on Black6 genomic DNA across the region and AK090361.1 from C57BL/6, which is unspliced and retains the region in question confirm the reference assembly.

issue.description: Evidence suggests that CAAA01066905.1 is placed incorrectly in the reference assembly.
issue.resolution_text: WGS contig CAAA01066905.1 incorrectly placed on chromosome 4, the contig resides on chromosome 5, this has been replaced in the chromosome 4 TPF by the correct contig CAAA01066805.1

issue.description: The gene Dhrsx (Gene ID: 236082) has been reported as missing from the reference chromosome 4; it is found only on an chr.4 unlocalized contig (NT_166291.1).
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.description: The gene Dhrsx is on an unplaced contig assigned to mouse chromosome 4 in Build 37, however the human ortholog is on human chromosome X. User requests we double check the chromosome assignment of this contig.
issue.resolution_text: FISH mapping places the mouse homolog of Dhrsx on chromosome 4E: PMID:11731500.

issue.description: Possible duplication flanking an assembly gap between AL844494.41 and AL772334.16 may affect representation of Ccl21 gene family members.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.description: Vmn2r122 (GeneID: 22308, NM_009492.2) does not have a high quality alignment to the reference assembly in Build 37.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the proteins encoded by the RefSeq for Pou3f1 (GeneID:18991, NM_011141.2) and the reference component to which it aligns,
issue.resolution_text: The 1-nt insertion in AL606907.9 compared to RefSeq NM_011141.2 was a sequencing error, the correction and resubmission of the component fixes the error. The updated accession is AL606907.10

issue.summary: Incorrect WGS contig placed on chr.4
issue.description: CAAA01066905.1 is incorrectly placed on ref. chr. 5
issue.resolution_text: WGS component CAAA01066905.1 has been removed from the chromosome 4 TPF and has been replaced by the correct WGS component CAAA01066805.1

issue.summary: Part of Samd11 (GeneID: 231004) is missing from the assembly
issue.description: Part of Samd11 (GeneID: 231004, NM_001110516.1) is missing from the assembly
issue.resolution_text: WGS contig CAAA01066805.1 has been added to the TPF to fully represent the Samd11 gene in the reference assembly.

issue.summary: V2R Missing in Build 37 (Present in Build 36)
issue.description: User reports V2R gene family member (present in Build 36) is missing from Mouse Build 37.
issue.resolution_text: CAAA01174334.1, which represents the missing AF011412.1, has been placed on a chr. 4 unlocalized scaffold in GRCm38.

issue.status_text: The reference has been verified, but the existence of contradictory C57BL/6J sequences may be evidence for unrecognized intra-strain variation. This issue will be re-visited when an SOP for investigation of mouse variation is developed.
issue.description: AL645731.8 has a 1-nt deletion compared to NM_001033875.2 at nt 208 of the transcript. Translation of the genome sequence results in a frameshift and premature termination.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Inconsistent orientations involving AL8444941.41 and AL824709.35 are disrupting contig building
issue.description: Inconsistent orientations involving AL8444941.41 and AL824709.35 with adjacent TPF components are disrupting contig building
issue.resolution_text: Due to alignment and orientation issues that precluded contid building the affected components have type-2 gaps inserted between them in the TPF while the region is investigated further.

issue.summary: Multiple problems in region of CR589880.3 to BX001066.14 causing contig bldg problems
issue.description: Multiple problems in region of CR589880.3 to BX001066.14 causing contig bldg problems
issue.resolution_text: Due to alignment and orientation issues that precluded contid building the affected components have type-2 gaps inserted between them in the TPF while the region is investigated further.

issue.summary: Lack of alignment between BX324127.8/CU210918.1 causing contig building problems
issue.description: Lack of alignment between adjacent TPF components BX324127.8/CU210918.1 causing contig building problem
issue.resolution_text: CU210918 aligns to Chrm2 and is redundant under AL773514/AL773516. The component has been removed from the TPF.

issue.summary: Inconsistent orientations in alignments involving AL713918.22 are disrupting contig building
issue.description: Inconsistent orientations in alignments involving AL713918.22 with adjacent TPF components are disrupting contig building
issue.resolution_text: CU024912 is redundant under AL731810/AL713918 and has been removed from the TPF

issue.summary: Lack of alignments between AL606987.11/CU463325.7 and CU463325.7/CU041236.3 causing contig building problems

issue.resolution_text: CU463325.7 in incorrect position in the TPF. Component has been moved and a gap inserted between AL606987.11 and CU041236.3

issue.description: Gap present between components AL929393.8 and CR936852.6
issue.resolution_text: Misassembly detected in component AL929393.8 preventing overlap with CR936852.6. Component assembly has been corrected and AL929393.9 now overlaps component AL844222.19 making CR936852.6 redundant. CR936852.6 has been removed from the reference and gap closed.

issue.description: Gap present between components CU467809.8 and AL844494.41
issue.resolution_text: The components CU467809 and AL844494 have been resubmitted to represent the full clone insert in the INSDC submission. The updated accessions are CU467809.9 and AL844494.42. The tile path has been altered based on sequence overlaps to AL807796-CU467809-CT868690-AL824709-AL844494.

issue.description: Gap present between components CU062621.5 and CR550303.18
issue.resolution_text: Component CU463345.6 was finished post MGSCv37 extending off CU062621.5. The optical map supports the TPF CU062621-CU463335-GAP-CR550303. The TPF has been updated.

issue.description: Gap present between components CR847872.2 and CT571246.8
issue.resolution_text: Clone WI1-1716K23 has been finished and accession FO907137.2 has been added to the TPF closing the gap between components CR847872.2 and CT571246.8.

issue.description: Gap present between components CR550303.18 and CU041251.14

issue.resolution_text: na

issue.description: Gap present between components AL844494.41 and AL824709.35
issue.resolution_text: Trimmed component AL844494.41 has beed resubmitted as the full clone insert. Updated version AL844494.42 has an overlap with AL824709.35 of ~75kb.

issue.description: Gap present between components AL824709.35 and CT868690.23
issue.resolution_text: Component CT868690.23 has been resubmitted to correct the assembly. Updated version CT868690.24 has an overlap with AL824709.35 of ~84.5kb.

issue.description: Gap present between components CT868690.23 and CT868723.17
issue.resolution_text: The component CT868690 has been resubmitted to represent the full clone insert in the INSDC submission. The updated accession is CT868690.24. The tile path has been altered based on sequence overlaps to AL807796-CU467809-CT868690-AL824709-AL844494. CT868723 has a high quality alignment to BX548253/AL772334 and may be redundant. CT868723 been moved to chr4 reference_unlocalized until the component can be either placed in the reference assembly or determined redundant.

issue.description: Gap present between components CR974586.23 and BX666061.27
issue.resolution_text: CR974586.23 has a high quality alignment to CT868690/AL824709 and may be redundant. CR974586.23 been moved to chr4 reference_unlocalized until the component can be either placed in the reference assembly or determined redundant.

issue.description: Gap present between components CU463345.6 and CU041251.14
issue.resolution_text:
Optical map information suggests CU463345.6 and CU041251.14 are not paired across a gap. CU463345.6 has been added into the TPF post build 37 and was finished extending off component CU062621.5, optical map data supports this placement. The TPF has been updated to reflect this.
Optical map information supports the build 37 TPF with CR550303.18 and CU041251.14 being paired across the gap. The gap is ~11kb.

issue.description: Gap present between components CU041251.14 and BX001066.14
issue.resolution_text: CU041251.14 and BX001066.15 overlap by 117kb, misassembly found in BX001066.14 causing disruptions to the alignment. Assembly has been corrected and component updated to BX001066.15

issue.description: Gap present between components CU062436.5 and CU041236.3
issue.resolution_text: Analysis of optical map data shows the TPF to be incorrect in this region. Optical map data is consistent with a TPF of AL929465-GAP-CR788296-AL606987-GAP-BX936357-AL627077-CR974438-GAP-CU041236 Component CU062436 is wholly redundant under AL954334-AL929462-AL731663. Optical map data sizes the gap between AL929465 and CR788296 as 360kb and the gap between AL606987 and BX936357 as 300kb.

issue.summary: SNP analysis of the Mouse Genomes Project suggests a possible single nucleotide error in reference clone AL833775.7.

issue.description: The placement of CAAA01066905.1 in ref. chr. 4 may be incorrect, affecting the representation of Samd11 (GeneID: 231004, NM_001110516.1).
issue.resolution_text: WGS contig CAAA01066905.1 incorrectly placed on chromosome 4, the contig resides on chromosome 5, this has been replaced in the chromosome 4 TPF by the correct contig CAAA01066805.1
